title: Which is the best IPU college in greater Noida for commerce and management courses? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know about the IPU colleges but I know about YMCA university's best college that is Aravali college of Engineering and management,Faridabad in DELHI/NCR region. Top college from YMCA university affiliated colleges always YMCA university toppers are from Aravali. I suggest everyone please visit once aravali college or aravali website if anyone plan for peruse Engineering and management.Best college campus best placement.
JIMS greater noida is the best IPU College in greater noida for commerce and management courses
